channel.title: Anims and skin assistance for my first mod
channel.description: So, I'm a new mod creator. I'm currently making my FIRST map for my FIRST mod but I've made GMod maps before though. I'm trying to get a scientist to sit down but it's not working. When I tried with the actbusy, he doesn't move. When I tried with scripted_sequence, he just magically disappeared. also, while we're in the topic of scientists, How do you make his skin the Pre - Resonance Cascade skin?

item.title: Anims and skin assistance for my first mod
item.dc:creator: Narwhale_King77
item.description:
So, I’m a new mod creator. I’m currently making my FIRST map for my FIRST mod but I’ve made GMod maps before though. I’m trying to get a scientist to sit down but it’s not working. When I tried with the actbusy, he doesn’t move. When I tried with scripted_sequence, he just magically disappeared. also, while we’re in the topic of scientists, How do you make his skin the Pre - Resonance Cascade skin?

Read full topic
item.source: Anims and skin assistance for my first mod
